Initial information is that a 22-year-old male temporarily

Signs of suspected
monkeypox. The patient's sample was taken for testing and the

The patient is currently being
quarantined and treated at the
Central Hospital of Tropical Diseases.
Tan Binh District Health has conducted an epidemiological investigation and compiled a
list of people who had close contact with the patient
within 21 days before the onset of illness.
These cases are in normal health and
have not recorded any signs of illness. They are
guided by health monitoring.
